description: The end-to-end process for a new user to register, verify their email, and successfully log in to the application.

userStories.title: New User Registration
steps: Enter a valid, unique email address.
Enter a strong password (minimum 8 characters, one uppercase, one number).
userStories.expectedResult: User is redirected to the 'Verify Email' page and a verification email is sent.

userStories.title: Email Verification
userStories.expectedResult: User is redirected to the 'Account Verified' page and their account status is updated to 'verified'.

userStories.title: User Login
steps: Enter the registered and verified email address.
userStories.expectedResult: User is successfully logged into the application and redirected to the main dashboard.

negativeTestScenarios.expectedError: An account with this email already exists.
